${ModID}:GreenNeutralizer.NAME: Green Neutralizer
${ModID}:GreenNeutralizer.DESCRIPTION: professor:Reactant. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:HolyArborCrystal.NAME: Holy Arbor Crystal
${ModID}:HolyArborCrystal.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Bomb.NAME: Bomb
${ModID}:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:CrystalIceBomb.NAME: Crystal Ice Bomb
${ModID}:CrystalIceBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DarkNightTreasure.NAME: Dark Night Treasure
${ModID}:DarkNightTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Kill ALL enemies with !M! or less HP.

${ModID}:DawnGrimoire.NAME: Dawn Grimoire
${ModID}:DawnGrimoire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal !M! HP for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ElysiumHarp.NAME: Elysium Harp
${ModID}:ElysiumHarp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !Professor:M2! cards. NL Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

${ModID}:LautePlajig.NAME: Laute Plajig
${ModID}:LautePlajig.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! professor:Exposed to a random enemy !Professor:M2! times.

${ModID}:Luft.NAME: Luft
${ModID}:Luft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:ThornyEmbrace.NAME: Thorny Embrace
${ModID}:ThornyEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:AetherEssence.NAME: Aether Essence
${ModID}:AetherEssence.DESCRIPTION: You may not receive additional debuffs this combat.

${ModID}:AlchemyFibers.NAME: Alchemy Fibers
${ModID}:AlchemyFibers.DESCRIPTION: professor:Gather a{!Upgrades!|>0=n Upgraded}{@@} professor:Synthesis card. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AmberOil.NAME: Amber Oil
${ModID}:AmberOil.DESCRIPTION: professor:Reactant. NL Whenever you play a professor:Fire or professor:Bolt card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:DragonBlood.NAME: Dragon Blood
${ModID}:DragonBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you professor:Infuse a card, the professor:Infusion is performed !M! additional time{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.
${ModID}:DragonBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you professor:Infuse a card, the professor:Infusion is performed !M! additional time{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:DreamFlower.NAME: Dream Flower
${ModID}:DreamFlower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|>3=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:EmperorUni.NAME: Emperor Uni
${ModID}:EmperorUni.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL professor:Infuse "Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies" into all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EternalCrystal.NAME: Eternal Crystal
${ModID}:EternalCrystal.DESCRIPTION: professor:Catalyst. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:EternalFire.NAME: Eternal Fire
${ModID}:EternalFire.DESCRIPTION: Professor:Reactant. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Replace a card in your hand with a copy of this.

${ModID}:EtherealStone.NAME: Ethereal Stone
${ModID}:EtherealStone.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FireEssence.NAME: Fire Essence
${ModID}:FireEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:FlamingBlackSand.NAME: Flaming Black Sand
${ModID}:FlamingBlackSand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was professor:Fire, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|>3=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Fragile.NAME: Fragile
${ModID}:Fragile.DESCRIPTION: professor:Infuse "Gain !M! Block" into all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GiantClaws.NAME: Giant Claws
${ModID}:GiantClaws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Giant Claws by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:GoldenCrown.NAME: Golden Crown
${ModID}:GoldenCrown.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL {!Upgrades!|>0=Upgrade it and add|@=Add}{@@} a copy of it into your deck. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:GoldUni.NAME: Gold Uni
${ModID}:GoldUni.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each professor:Bolt card played this combat.

${ModID}:HeroicSpirit.NAME: Heroic Spirit
${ModID}:HeroicSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL While in hand, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} whenever you spend Energy.{@@}
${ModID}:HeroicSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} whenever you spend Energy.{@@}

${ModID}:HolyArborBranch.NAME: Holy Arbor Branch
${ModID}:HolyArborBranch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Holy *Arbor *Crystal{@@}{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:IceEssence.NAME: Ice Essence
${ModID}:IceEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Retained, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:LightningEssence.NAME: Lightning Essence
${ModID}:LightningEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! professor:Exposed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LunarDrop.NAME: Lunar Drop
${ModID}:LunarDrop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each professor:Ice card played this combat. NL Exhaust.{!Location!|0= NL (Gain !Professor:I! Block)}{@@}

${ModID}:ManaEaterBranch.NAME: Mana-Eater Branch
${ModID}:ManaEaterBranch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ManaLantern.NAME: Mana Lantern
${ModID}:ManaLantern.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|>3=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:MedicinalMoss.NAME: Medicinal Moss
${ModID}:MedicinalMoss.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! of your debuffs.

${ModID}:MistLiquid.NAME: Mist Liquid
${ModID}:MistLiquid.DESCRIPTION: professor:Reactant. NL Whenever you play an professor:Ice or professor:Wind card, gain !M! professor:Braced.

${ModID}:OldenPhilosophersStone.NAME: Philosopher's Form
${ModID}:OldenPhilosophersStone.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You may play a card you do not have the Energy for {!M!|1=once|>1=!M! times} per turn.{@@}
${ModID}:OldenPhilosophersStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may play a card you do not have the Energy for {!M!|1=once|>1=!M! times} per turn.{@@}

${ModID}:OldMagicTome.NAME: Old Magic Tome
${ModID}:OldMagicTome.DESCRIPTION: professor:Unlock a card. NL Upgrade it !M! times this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Pierce.NAME: Pierce
${ModID}:Pierce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies{!M!|>1= !M! times}{@@}.

${ModID}:PoisonGrass.NAME: Poison Grass
${ModID}:PoisonGrass.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL professor:Infuse "Apply !M! Poison" into a card.

${ModID}:PoisonPowder.NAME: Poison Powder
${ModID}:PoisonPowder.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack applies !M! Poison on hit.

${ModID}:PolishingPowder.NAME: Polishing Powder
${ModID}:PolishingPowder.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RestraintSilk.NAME: Restraint Silk
${ModID}:RestraintSilk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! professor:Exposed and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Septrin.NAME: Septrin
${ModID}:Septrin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, professor:Spectrumize it.

${ModID}:ShiningSand.NAME: Shining Sand
${ModID}:ShiningSand.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Next turn, NL gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|>3=!M! [E]}. NL When you draw this card, apply !Professor:M2! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SmallCrystals.NAME: Small Crystal
${ModID}:SmallCrystals.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:TemptingSap.NAME: Tempting Sap
${ModID}:TemptingSap.DESCRIPTION: professor:Infuse "Apply !M! Poison" into all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TorchGrass.NAME: Torch Grass
${ModID}:TorchGrass.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:TransportCannon.NAME: Transport Cannon
${ModID}:TransportCannon.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards next turn. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${ModID}:VirgoRequiemFlower.NAME: Requiem Flower
${ModID}:VirgoRequiemFlower.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:VortexSand.NAME: Vortex Sand
${ModID}:VortexSand.DESCRIPTION: Draw X {!M!|>0=+ !M!}{@@} cards. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WaterUni.NAME: Water Uni
${ModID}:WaterUni.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL While held, deal !M! damage back whenever you are attacked.

${ModID}:WindEssence.NAME: Wind Essence
${ModID}:WindEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw your sixth card each turn, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.
${ModID}:WindEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw your sixth card each turn, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.
